ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds baby (1 to 2-inch long) potatoes, halved lengthwise
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons butter, cut into small chunks

cookingTips: Halve potatoes lengthwise to create a flat surface for grilling and better caramelization
Parboil potatoes for 5-7 minutes before grilling to ensure they cook through before the exterior burns
Use a grill basket or thread onto skewers to prevent small pieces from falling through the grates
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best way to ensure baby potatoes are tender inside with crispy grilled edges?
